alert.note: Alert for Eastern Cherry; Sheridan; Western Cherry (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Blizzard Warning issued April 04 at 3:19PM CDT until April 05 at 7:00PM CDT by NWS NorthPlatte
info.description: ...BLIZZARD WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ WEDNESDAY... * WHAT...Blizzard conditions expected. Additional snow accumulations of 2 to 4 inches. Winds gusting as high as 45 mph. * WHERE...Sheridan, Eastern Cherry and Western Cherry Counties, mainly from Highway 20 northward. * WHEN...Until 7 PM CDT /6 PM MDT/ Wednesday. * IMPACTS...Travel will be very difficult to impossible. Expect near whiteout conditions with blowing snow. Gusty winds could bring down tree branches and cause scattered power outages. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...Cold wind chills are likely Wednesday morning with values 5 to 10 below zero.
info.instruction: Travel should be restricted to emergencies only. If you must travel, have a winter survival kit with you. If you get stranded, stay with your vehicle. Call Nebraska 511 for the latest road information.
